level.heading: Sunset.
level.text: This chapter shall expire on September 30, 2014.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5019 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 44-631.
